message.content: {"responses": [{"question_id": "TT4G35A", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers write or improve lesson plans.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35B", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35C", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence assists teachers in supporting students individually.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35D", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence supports students with specific needs (e.g. multilingual learners, students with special education needs).", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35E", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers automate administrative tasks.", "response": "Strongly agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35F", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35G", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35H", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35I", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence jeopardises the privacy and security of student data.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35J", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students.", "response": "Agree"}]}
message.reasoning_content:
I need to respond to 10 statements about AI in education. As a primary or secondary school teacher from Republic of North Macedonia, I should provide thoughtful responses based on my perspective as an educator. Let me think about each statement:

[TT4G35A]: AI helps teachers write or improve lesson plans - This is generally true. AI can assist in generating ideas and improving structure. I would "Agree"

[TT4G35B]: AI enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities - This is increasingly true with AI's capability to personalize content. I would "Agree"

[TT4G35C]: AI assists teachers in supporting students individually - AI can help through personalized feedback and tutoring systems. I would "Agree"

[TT4G35D]: AI supports students with specific needs - AI has good potential for multilingual and special education support. I would "Agree"

[TT4G35E]: AI helps teachers automate administrative tasks - This is clearly true, grading, attendance, etc. I would "Strongly agree"

[TT4G35F]: AI enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own - This is a risk/concern about AI. I would "Agree" (that this is a concern/risk)

[TT4G35G]: AI makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct - Yes, this is a legitimate concern about accuracy. I would "Agree"

[TT4G35H]: AI amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions - This is a known concern about AI. I would "Agree"

[TT4G35I]: AI jeopardises the privacy and security of student data - This is a legitimate concern. I would "Agree"

[TT4G35J]: AI suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches - This is a possible concern. I would "Agree"

Let me prepare the responses with the correct format for the function call.
